desc: Adds possible Curse effect to normal attack

dictionary.lore: The Cursed Sabre which had been used in Ragu Blaze's execution was afterwards wielded by the one who had carried out the execution. A rumor has also spread that after all the bloodshed this blade had seen, it was soon able to absorb its user's emotions. Getting word of this, imperial leaders decided to seal the sword away, but upon checking the armory it was nowhere to be found. Around the same time a sinister-looking man brandishing a long sword appeared in the empire.

name: Cursed Sword
